about_the_game:
Thousands of Lies. Hundreds of horrors. Ten hours. One Way Home

Jimmy Taylor is a boy who finds himself at the center of mysterious events in his hometown. Returning home from school in the evening, Jimmy is involved in a car accident. Waking up, he finds himself on deserted streets in a mysterious place from which it is now up to him to get out.

Lonely and lost, he searches for a way home, encountering unknown and sometimes frightening mysteries and events along the way.

Many Roads




Jimmy will have several roads to choose from. Each road will have its own obstacles, secrets, and rewards. From these choices, Jimmy will pump up his skills, change the progression of the story, and get closer to one of the four endings. Help Jimmy build his one and only and unique path home.

"Crayon story"




Animated crayon drawings tell you the story of this world and its inhabitants, of secrets and mysteries, of Jimmy and his destiny. Find all the parts of the “crayon story” and find out the true reasons for what happened.

Unique enemies and bosses




Meet distorted creatures in your path, scary and frightening. Hide and run or they will consume Jimmy's mind.

A variety of puzzles




Jimmy will face many obstacles on the way home and only you can help him. Show your wit and find the right solution.

Item Throws




Throws will not only help you distract the enemy, but also help you solve the puzzle. Jimmy picks up objects and throws them accurately at the target with your help. Look for places to throw and maybe you will discover something new.
detailed_description:
Thousands of Lies. Hundreds of horrors. Ten hours. One Way Home

Jimmy Taylor is a boy who finds himself at the center of mysterious events in his hometown. Returning home from school in the evening, Jimmy is involved in a car accident. Waking up, he finds himself on deserted streets in a mysterious place from which it is now up to him to get out.

Lonely and lost, he searches for a way home, encountering unknown and sometimes frightening mysteries and events along the way.

Many Roads




Jimmy will have several roads to choose from. Each road will have its own obstacles, secrets, and rewards. From these choices, Jimmy will pump up his skills, change the progression of the story, and get closer to one of the four endings. Help Jimmy build his one and only and unique path home.

"Crayon story"




Animated crayon drawings tell you the story of this world and its inhabitants, of secrets and mysteries, of Jimmy and his destiny. Find all the parts of the “crayon story” and find out the true reasons for what happened.

Unique enemies and bosses




Meet distorted creatures in your path, scary and frightening. Hide and run or they will consume Jimmy's mind.

A variety of puzzles




Jimmy will face many obstacles on the way home and only you can help him. Show your wit and find the right solution.

Item Throws




Throws will not only help you distract the enemy, but also help you solve the puzzle. Jimmy picks up objects and throws them accurately at the target with your help. Look for places to throw and maybe you will discover something new.
name: ONE WAY HOME

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit OS required)
  • Processor: Unspecified
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Unspecified
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 9 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Direct X Compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit OS required)
  • Processor: Unspecified
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Unspecified
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 9 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Direct X Compatible

short_description: Take on the role of a twelve-year-old boy in this puzzle platformer about the journey home through the most terrifying of nightmares. Each playthrough is unique: the choices you make affect the types of skills and locations, the story's progression, and its ending.
supported_languages:
English*, Russian*, Traditional Chinese, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Korean, Dutch, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal, Romanian, Turkish, Finnish, Czech, Swedish, Japanese, Bulgarian, Portuguese - Brazil, Hungarian, Danish, Spanish - Latin America, Norwegian, Arabic, Vietnamese, Greek, Indonesian, Thai, Ukrainian
*languages with full audio support
